column2: In  addition  to  the  above  conviction we  impose  a conviction for  causing disappearance of evidence on
lSI  accused-appellant  and  impose  a  sentence  of 5  years  Rigorous  Imprisonment  with  a  fine  of

column1: Rupees 10,000/-. In  default six months simple imprisonment.
The sentences imposed are effective from  the date of this order i.e. from  today
